text.en: Having seen the luxuries of saṃsāra as akin to a nest of vipers,
text.en-trans: khorwé püntsok dukdrul tsang tabur

text.en: You sincerely turned away from compulsive attachment
text.en-trans: tong né tsé di jawa tamché la

text.en: To the affairs of the present life, and became a renunciant—
text.en-trans: ngön zhen tingné lokpé ja tangwa

text.en: Tsokdruk Rangdrol, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: tsok druk rangdrol zhab la solwa deb

text.en: May the stream of nectarous explanations of the profound path
text.en-trans: khyö tuk shel kar bum zang lé tönpé

text.en: That flows from the excellent crystal vase of your wisdom heart
text.en-trans: zablam lek shé dütsi chugyün gyi

text.en: Wash away all the afflictions that sully the jewel of my mind
text.en-trans: rangsem norbü nyönmong drima kün

text.en: And bring about the fulfilment of all wishes for twofold benefit.
text.en-trans: trü né dön nyi gödö künjung shok

text.en: You, the one who clearly understands all that is knowable,
text.en-trans: shejé chö nam malü saler khyen

text.en: And who, with loving kindness and compassion,
text.en-trans: jam dang tsewé dro la zabgyé chö

text.en: Teaches the Dharma, profound and vast, authentic root guru,
text.en-trans: tönpé tsenden tsawé lama yi

text.en: May your life remain secure for a hundred aeons!
text.en-trans: kutsé kal gyé bardu tenpar shok

text.en: A handsome form of signs and marks born of twofold accumulation,
text.en-trans: tsok nyi lé trung tsenpé dzepé ku

text.en: Sweetly melodious speech resonant with the sixty wondrous qualities,
text.en-trans: yenlak drukchü dangden nyenpé sung

text.en: And a non-grasping mind, empty clarity, in whichkleśas liberate themselves—
text.en-trans: nyönmong rangdrol saltong dzinmé tuk

text.en: To the guru’s enlightened body, speech and mind, I pray.
text.en-trans: lamé ku sung tuk la solwa deb

text.en: May my body be infused with the blessings of the guru’s form,
text.en-trans: lü la lamé ku yi jingyi lob

text.en: May physical obscurations be purified and blissful warmth ignite,
text.en-trans: lü kyi drib dak dé drö barwa dang

text.en: May my body become a deathless rainbow form, a kāya of light,
text.en-trans: lü ni chimé jalü ökur gyur

text.en: And may I physically become a source of benefit to others.
text.en-trans: lü kyi zhen la pen tok jungwar shok

text.en: May my speech be infused with the blessings of the guru’s speech,
text.en-trans: ngak la lamé sung gi jingyi lob

text.en: May vocal obscurations be purified and my power increase,
text.en-trans: ngak gi drib dak nüpa jungwa dang

text.en: May my voice become the unceasing melodious voice of Brahmā,
text.en-trans: ngak ni gakmé tsangpé yang su gyur

text.en: And may I vocally become a source of benefit to others.
text.en-trans: ngak gi zhen la pen tok jungwar shok

text.en: May my mind be infused with the blessings of the guru’s mind,
text.en-trans: sem la lamé tuk kyi jingyi lob

text.en: May mental obscurations be purified and experience and realization unfold,
text.en-trans: sem kyi drib dak nyamtok charwa dang

text.en: May my mind become the dharmakāya beyond delusion,
text.en-trans: sem ni trulmé chö kyi ku ru gyur

text.en: And may I mentally become a source of benefit to others.
text.en-trans: sem kyi zhen la pen tok jungwar shok

text.en: Guru Vajradhara, embodiment of the entire threefold refuge,
text.en-trans: kyab sum kündü lama dorjé chang

text.en: Assuming the form of spiritual guides who trains according to what is needed—
text.en-trans: gang la gang dul shenyen tsul zang né

text.en: Those who confer the attainments, ordinary and supreme,
text.en-trans: chok dang tünmong ngödrub tsol dzepé

text.en: Gracious gurus, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drinchen lama nam la solwa deb

text.en: In all my lives, may I never be separated from genuine guru,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu yangdak lama dang

text.en: May I enjoy the splendour of the Dharma,
text.en-trans: dralmé chö kyi pal la longchö ching

text.en: And by perfecting the qualities of the paths and stages,
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi yönten rabdzok né

text.en: May I swiftly attain the level of Vajradhara!
text.en-trans: dorjé chang gi gopang nyur tob shok

text.en: That I have encountered the teachings of the unsurpassable Teacher
text.en-trans: tönpa lanamepé tenpa dang

text.en: In this way is due to the guru’s kindness.
text.en-trans: jalwa dindra lamé drin yinpé

text.en: I therefore dedicate all my virtue, so that each and every being
text.en-trans: gewa di yang drowa malüpa

text.en: May be accepted and cared for by such a noble spiritual guide.
text.en-trans: shenyen dampé dzinpé gyu ru ngo

text.en: Towards the lifestyle and activity of the guru,
text.en-trans: palden lamé nampar tarpa la

text.en: May wrong view not arise for even an instant, and
text.en-trans: kechik tsam yang lokta mi kyé zhing

text.en: May I regard whatever is done as a teaching for me.
text.en-trans: chi dzé lekpar tongwé mögü kyi

text.en: Through such devotion, may the guru’s blessing inspire and fill my mind!
text.en-trans: lamé jinlab sem la jukpar shok
